title: Traumatic brain injury: a review of pathophysiology and therapeutic potential of polyphenols.
abstract: Traumatic brain injury (TBI) is severe and may become debilitating for sufferers as a result of damage to the brain. Defining features include primary trauma, axonal damage, as well as both diffuse and focal lesions. One of the many complex biological responses to TBI are neuroinflammation and oxidative stress which are among the most important.
